rules_text:
First strike
When Chosen of Heliod enters, bless target creature. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
{4}{W}{W}: Bless target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures. [i](This creature can’t be blocked, targeted or dealt damage by creatures.)[/i]
